summary: The diff does not implement the requested fix to show the user-uploaded image in the final reveal. Only `project_state.json` was modified; no frontend component or public asset changes are present.

missing_requirements.requirement: In the final step of the bottom "OneMoreThingInteraction" reveal (after the third click), display the user-provided uploaded image (original filename: "627674318_941888025190821_1390922055753035112_n.jpg") by ensuring the correct file exists under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with a clean stable filename and that `frontend/src/components/OneMoreThingInteraction.tsx` references that exact public URL.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no changes to `frontend/src/components/OneMoreThingInteraction.tsx` and no added/modified files under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`. Therefore the final reveal image source cannot have been updated to the required `/assets/generated/...` static asset URL.
evidence: project_state.json (only modified file in diff); no changes shown for frontend/src/components/OneMoreThingInteraction.tsx; no added files under frontend/public/assets/generated/

hallucinated_features.description: Updated `project_state.json` project summary/feature metadata unrelated to fixing the final reveal image source.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest asks to update the final reveal image by adding a static asset and referencing it from `OneMoreThingInteraction.tsx`. The diff only changes `project_state.json`, which is not part of the requested implementation.
